attributes.action: Make Leicestershire County Council cut the grass verges and hedges.
attributes.background: The grass verges and hedges are so long it is making rural areas dangerous and roads narrow. In the city it looks very untidy.

rejection.details:
Road and hedge maintenance in Leicestershire is the responsibility of the County Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

E-petitions may be submitted to the Council via its own portal here:
http://politics.leics.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
